basic.description: This course is an introduction to materials chemistry, focusing on the structure, properties, and functional applications of molecular materials, polymers, glasses and ceramics, metals and alloys, and bio- and nanomaterials.
basic.subject: CHM
basic.title: Chemistry of Materials

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: CHM 1045 or CHM 1046; CHM 2210 or CHM 2211; or instructor permission.
